page.title: 04Leichlingen Link Report
page.content: Henley has a twin town in Germany called Leichlingen in west Germany it has 20,000 inhabitants. It is twice the size of Henley with a little river running through it. The schools are bigger than the ones in Henley. Mr Probert the chairman has been on the Henley Leichlingen committee for 8 years. The committee has twelve people. Twining started 40 years ago in Reading and nine years ago in Henley. People from Leichlingen visit Henley. They bring gifts of wine and apple juice. Time in Leichlingen is one hour ahead of Henley time. Summer temperatures are about 79 degrees Fahrenheit and winter is about 3 or 4 degrees colder than Henley. Around the Leichlingen area there are lots of castles and churches there is a big river near Leichlingen called the river Rhine.
